project.description: Build project with sensitive information in the build output

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash echo "Building project..." echo "Running tests..." echo "Tests passed!" echo "Deploying to staging environment..." echo "Setting up environment variables..." echo "API_KEY=12345abcdef" echo "SECRET_TOKEN=s3cr3t_t0k3n" echo "FLAG: FLAG_PLACEHOLDER_13" echo "Deployment completed!"
